attachments.displayName:
[AYURVEDA REVELS…HOW TO LIVE 100 YEARS OF AGE…………………]
GUIDELINES TO FOLLOW FOR ACHIEVING 100 YEARS OF AGE….

>>HOW TO LIVE 100 YEARS:
In India when we bless to some one for long life…we say God bless you for 100 years…it’s a common quote. Ayurveda also revels the life style and living style that leads to 100 years of age. These are simple ...but must be followed from the cradle for better results. Follow from food …food habits and some activities and actions…… that must be carried out and followed honestly for longer life. Apart from guidelines of Ayurveda on food….food habits…there are following recommendations by Ayurveda that must be followed throughout life for healthy and long life.

>>1:
CURE TRIDOSHAS THROUGH:
VATA (Wind)…PITTA (Bile) and KAPHA (Phelm or Cough) management:
>1: FOR VATA: Oil massage on body
>2: FOR PITTA: Sleeping
>3: FOR KAPHA: Vomiting

>>2:
CNSUMPTION OF MILK…WATER and TAKRA (Mattha)….In English Butter milk:
Milk before sleep….Water in the morning and Buttrmilk after lunch.

>>3:
FOOD MUST BE DONE IN 12 MONTHS:
JANUARY: Ghee (Clarified butter) and Khichdi (rice+ black pulse)
FEBRUARY: Early morning bath
MARCH: Consumption of Neemboli (Neem fruit)
APRIL: (information not available)
MAY: Sleeping in day after meal.
JUNE: (information not available)
JULY: Consumption of HARAD
AUGUST: Swertia (Chirata)…herb
SEPTEMBER: Gud (Sugar cane cake )
OCTOBER: Radish
NOVEMBER: Oil
DECEMBER: Milk

>>4:
MANDATORY AVOIDABLE:

>JANUARY: Suger
>FEBRUARY: Gram
>MARCH: Gud (Can sugar cake)
>APRIL: Oil
>MAY: (information not available)
>JUNE: Stone apple (Bael)
>JULY:  All Leafy vegetable
>AUGUST: Curd
>SEPTEMBER: Zeera
>OCTOBER: (information not available)
>NOVEMBER: (information not available)
>DECEMBER: Milk

>>4:
POST MEAL ACTIVITY:
Food must be taken 2-3 hours before sleep…otherwise there will be constipation problem. 100 yards slow walk after meal.

>>5:
SLEEPING HABITS:
Left hand sleeping…for good digestion….bile strength is increased during left hand sleeping.

>>6:
MEAL CONSUMPTION:
2 times a day

>>7:
URINATION AND BOWEL REGULATION:
Urination at least 6 times and Bowel regulation 2 times….in the morning and evening.

>>8:
SEXUAL ACTIVITY:
Do not indulge much….Only minimum….we are not born for indulging in sex…but it is a biological need…Keep it minimum…elevate your inner qualities those are good for you and for society.

>>9:
MEDICATION:
If you follow the above guidelines you will not get ailed….if by chance you ail…go for medication…Do not linger it…because HEALTH is the first happiness

>>10:
WORSHIP:
Worship your God for his kindness….for every thing that God gives us.


Thanks and best regards with best wishes for over all good health and condition…trusting to have been of services to you I remain…..

Sincerely Yours,
Madan M Pandey (Ayurveda activist, freelance herbalist and research scholar on fundamentals of Ayurveda and rare remedies)
